segments.text: I see the adult woman focused on drying her plate, blissfully unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pours from the overflowing sink, forming a puddle that spreads across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is so calm, like she’s in her own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a pang of fear watching the boy on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It seems so easy for him to lose his balance and fall, and no one is noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl, with her hopeful outstretched hand, just adds to the tension of this moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder, does she even realize how risky this whole situation is?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden looks so peaceful, contrasting sharply with the potential danger inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If only the woman would glance over her shoulder, perhaps she could avert a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a mix of empathy for her routine and frustration at her obliviousness.
segments.speaker: PAR
